category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: SM_PREVENT_UPDATE_STATES
preference.preference_description: Locks the schedules and tasks that have the specified states, which prevents updates to them. After you change this preference's value, you must log off and then log on for it to take effect. Valid Values: Accepts one or more of the following internal state values: in_progress complete closed aborted
